post.text: How is Hillary so oblivious? It's pretty simple to see why she isn't 50 points ahead â€“ she called millions of people deplorable, she's owned by Washington insiders, and she's lied over and over to the public and thinks it's okay. comment.author: Valeriya
comment.text: Your fears should be in the other direction. She has been investigated they have spent a lot of money doing this and it's time to let it go she has been cleared. Im interested in Donald's tax info that's the story we are waiting for. He might be in stripes instead of a suit.ðŸ˜ƒ

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: No, she hasn't been cleared. She's had her cronies cover up for her. Big difference.

replies.author: Valeriya
replies.text: Rebecca not true check your facts stop listening to news that's not accurate.

replies.author: Rebecca
replies.text: Valeriya - Did you not hear Trey Gowdy question Comey? I suggest you listen to that interview. It's clear that she lied. It's clear that she wasn't "cleared". They just opted not to pursue it.

replies.author: Valeriya
replies.text: Because there isn't enough to do anything do you understand nothing you can't make something of nothing. I heard it.
